name: AlmostHalfAMeter
description:
W, A, S, D - Should move you around UP, LEFT, DOWN and right.

Q- should Interact with a note

E- Picks objects up.

Q and E will also move the player on the second level, but forwards and backwards.

A point to be brought up is that in the end, a widget will appear saying that you can press ESC to quit...but it didn't on the exported version. My apologies but I had less than an hour to submit and I was in a hurry.

Honestly, this is what happens when you poorly plan and leave everything to be made in the last two days. I know it may look rude to upload it, and honestly am sorry if you try to play it but I felt like it was a duty to submit "something" at least.

 Was it fun? Absolutely. It's good fun if you're looking for some glitches and funky game mechanics that didn't came out right because of lack of planning hahahaha!
